name: Show Your Talent
description:
IMPORTANT NOTICE: For this update, use Z to mute the music and sounds. Press the space bar whenever the game starts, and you are on the menu!

Welcome to Show Your Talent!

Show your dance skills to the judges and the audience as your progress through an intense game of matching notes to vinyls, avoiding bombs, and beating the clock!

HOW TO PLAY:

  • For PC, use A or D to activate one of the vinyls.
  • When a note touches a vinyl, activate that said vinyl with its controls. (A would be for the left vinyl, D for the right).
  • Do not touch bombs!
  • Do not miss notes!
  • Beat the clock and receive your judges score! (min. = 0, max. = 5)

This games soundtrack is brought to you by IdyllEDM, Colorblind!
